author: ralexstokes
content:
to expand on the above,

There is an ongoing issue with the Prysm consensus client on mainnet. If you are running Prysm, you will need to reconfigure your CL node as per the linked tweet.

If you are running another client, you are not affected and no action is required.

https://x.com/prylabs/status/1996439056604144097
